price: So We answered his prayer and rescued him from distress. This is how We rescue the believers.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
